front.title: IEEE Guide for Application of Power Apparatus Bushings

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Guidance on the use of outdoor power apparatus bushings is provided. The bushings are limited to those built in accordance with IEEE Std C57.19.00-1991. General information and recommendations for the application of power apparatus bushings when incorporated as part of power transformers, power circuit breakers, and isolated-phase bus are provided.
